details.title: How to Prevent Waste?
details.content:
You might have a lot of items with no specifical use in mind, althrought take those to a recycling center  might seem like a good choice, a better option would be to recreate the way you think about waste, and prevent waste in fist place by:

-What can you do to recycle?
*Redesign the products to fulfill a new use
*Repair and reuse products
*Be a more thinkful consumer
*Share your acknowledgment and skills with the comunitie to facilitate repair and reuse
*Change attitudes about wath to buy and wath to throw.

details.title: Which type of products can you recycle?
details.content:
Do you already recycle anything at home?
You can recycle from very simple elements such as plastic bags, and paper, to more complex such as cell phones by taking care of its future throw away, it good to mention that a firs good step would be to use the recycling bin sistem efficiently, however there are a lot of others options, in wich with help of your creativity you can get very interesting uses to the older products.
